title: Philly Celebrates/Riots, Doritos For Her 2.5.18
itunes:title: Philly Celebrates/Riots, Doritos For Her 2.5.18
description:
In episode 78, Jack & Miles are join by comedian Jamie Loftus to discuss Dorito's new chip idea for women, Uma Thurman's NY Times interview, Super Bowl ads, halftime show, Philly riots, Republicans distancing themselves from the 'memo,' & more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
